isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER RT-610 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - SYNCHRONIZER ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Place the larger low range synchronizer ring face down on a bench with pins up.
Place the sliding clutch, recessed side up, on the pins of the low range synchronizer ( Figure 82).

figure.caption: Figure 82. Place Sliding Clutch on Pins of Low Range Synchronizer

step1.para: Install the three springs in the bores in the high range synchronizer ring ( Figure 83).

figure.caption: Figure 83. Install Springs in Bores in High Range Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Place the high range synchronizer ring over the pins of the low speed synchronizer ring, seating the springs against the pins ( Figure 84).

figure.caption: Figure 84. Place High Range Synchronizer Ring Over Pins of Low Speed Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Apply pressure to the high range synchronizer ring to compress the springs and set the pins of the low range synchronizer fully into the bores of the high range synchronizer ring ( Figure 85).

figure.caption: Figure 85. Apply Pressure to High Range Synchronizer Ring to Compress Springs
